Title: Establishes a municipal epinephrine bulk purchase program and fund and provides for taxpayer gifts thereto
Summary: Establishes a municipal epinephrine bulk purchase program to enable municipalities to make bulk purchases of epinephrine for use by municipal first responder agencies and elementary and secondary schools in such municipality and provides for taxpayer gifts thereto.
LawCode: Amd §206, Pub Health L; add §§209-N & 630-h, Tax L; add §97-tttt, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing a municipal epinephrine bulk purchase program; and to amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing the municipal epinephrine bulk purchase fund and providing for taxpayer gifts thereto
